name: Topdown-Shooter Prototype
description:
This game is a prototype for a top-down shooter game that was made in a couple days. This project could become a possible future game and is also the first game I have ever released. I was expiramenting with a new way to make art but since I did not have an actual style, it was hard to make art assets for the game (ie the supply boxes and UI do not match the rest of the game). I got bored of working on this project but if people actually find this itch.io page and want me to continue working on this game, I think that my interest will be restored. Thank you to anybody who downloaded this game, ily <3

Controls:

WASD - move

Left Mouse Button - shoot

Switch Gun - 1 is pistol, 2 is uzi

Reload - r
